<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A helper class to manage the placement of various structures into the final</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// minidump binary. Space for objects can be allocated via various allocate&#42;&#42;&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// methods, while the final minidump file is written by calling the writeTo</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// method. The plain versions of allocation functions take a reference to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// data which is to be written (and hence the data must be available until</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// writeTo is called), while the &quot;New&quot; versions allocate the data in an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// allocator-managed buffer, which is available until the allocator object is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// destroyed. For both kinds of functions, it is possible to modify the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// data for which the space has been &quot;allocated&quot; until the final writeTo call.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is useful for &quot;linking&quot; the allocated structures via their offsets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-minidumpemitter-cpp-/bloballocator"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-minidumpemitter-cpp-/bloballocator">BlobAllocator</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">  Result.Location.DataSize =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">      DataEnd.value&#95;or(File.tell()) - Result.Location.RVA;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
